mapper.select: SELECT NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, USERID, WRITEDATE, VIEWS, WRITER FROM BEDU.COMMUNITY WHERE CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY NUM DESC
mapper.insert: insert into BEDU.COMMUNITY(userId, title, contents, writeDate, writer) values(#{userId}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE(), #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE BEDU.COMMUNITY SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents} WHERE NUM = #{num}
